channel.title: Rs4Pk
channel.description:
[center]Rs[color=orange]4[/color]Pk[/center] What i'm planning for Rs4Pk is to bring the old rs back, how are we going to do that? Make monsters where there suppose to be, make teles Lumbridge (Home), Varrock (Shops), (And the rest will be discusssed when you talk to me on msn). What i'm looking for that is important: Client Developer, Host, Server Developers, and Pictures|Logos|Background Maker | Staffmember Positions: Admin, Mods, Guides.
What Positions Will Be Doing Important Client Developer: Works on the Client and Webclient Host: Hosting server 24/7 or has VPS Server Developers: Will be coding with me on the source (Yes I code) Pictures|Logos|Background Maker: Says mostly in the name rofl.. Staffmembers Admin: Will be helping, making sure no one breaks rules, and settle out fights and ect Mod: Will be helping, and making sure no one breaks rules Guide: Guide is meant for when someone needs help pm him and he will answer you in yell
How much i need Client Developer: [0/1] Host: [0/1] Server Developer: [0/2] (I think thats the name)GFX Designer: [0/1] Admin: [0/2] Mod: [0/4] Guide: [0/3] (Will be updating everytime i get a new member!)
Contact Information & Youtube Vid On Source (Haven't edited, dont want to change something that you might want there) MSN: Austin_clay_newton@hotmail.com Youtube Vid: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sRDo1SQWmHI]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sRDo1SQWmHI[/url] [center](Note: You can post here just telling me what position u want, how good u r, if u have vps if ur applying for hoster, Just stuff like that)[/center] [center][size=24pt]DONT FLAME, DONT TRY TO STEAL SOURCE, BE SERIOUS ABOUT THE SOURCE, AND DONT FLAME!!!!![/size][/center] [center][size=36pt]Please Comment On Post If You Want Me To Make Screenshots!!!!![/size][/center]

item.title: Rs4Pk
item.dc:creator: @Sins_World Sins World
item.description:
@Sins_World wrote:

[center]Rs[color=orange]4[/color]Pk[/center]
What i’m planning for Rs4Pk is to bring the old rs back, how are we going to do that? Make monsters where there suppose to be, make teles Lumbridge (Home), Varrock (Shops), (And the rest will be discusssed when you talk to me on msn). What i’m looking for that is important: Client Developer, Host, Server Developers, and Pictures|Logos|Background Maker | Staffmember Positions: Admin, Mods, Guides.

What Positions Will Be Doing
Important
Client Developer: Works on the Client and Webclient
Host: Hosting server 24/7 or has VPS
Server Developers: Will be coding with me on the source (Yes I code)
Pictures|Logos|Background Maker: Says mostly in the name rofl…
Staffmembers
Admin: Will be helping, making sure no one breaks rules, and settle out fights and ect
Mod: Will be helping, and making sure no one breaks rules
Guide: Guide is meant for when someone needs help pm him and he will answer you in yell

How much i need
Client Developer: [0/1]
Host: [0/1]
Server Developer: [0/2]
(I think thats the name)GFX Designer: [0/1]
Admin: [0/2]
Mod: [0/4]
Guide: [0/3]
(Will be updating everytime i get a new member!)

Contact Information & Youtube Vid On Source (Haven’t edited, dont want to change something that you might want there)
MSN: Austin_clay_newton@hotmail.com
Youtube Vid: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sRDo1SQWmHI
[center](Note: You can post here just telling me what position u want, how good u r, if u have vps if ur applying for hoster, Just stuff like that)[/center]
[center][size=24pt]DONT FLAME, DONT TRY TO STEAL SOURCE, BE SERIOUS ABOUT THE SOURCE, AND DONT FLAME!!![/size][/center]
